mapper.update: update t_resume_info set name=#{name}, age=#{age}, gender=#{gender}, position=#{position}, phone=#{phone}, citizenship=#{citizenship}, education=#{education}, major=#{major}, country=#{country}, certification=#{certification}, specialized=#{specialized}, experience_length=#{experienceLength}, other_position=#{otherPosition}, updater_id=#{updaterId} where id=#{id}
mapper.select: select id, name,age,gender,position,phone,citizenship,education,major,country,certification,specialized, experience_length,other_positions,create_time,creator_id,updater_id,update_time from t_resume_info where id=#{id}

SELECT id,name,age,gender,position,phone,citizenship,education,major,country,certification,specialized, experience_length,other_positions,create_time,creator_id,updater_id,update_time FROM t_resume_info ORDER BY create_time DESC LIMIT #{beginIndex},#{size}
